document.title: Simple Upper Teeth Alignment with Clear Aligners
document.summary: We're using clear aligners to gently straighten your upper teeth over the next 4â€“6 months. Most of your progress will be tracked remotely, so you won't need to come in for frequent appointments. This plan doesn't include whitening, but it's focused on giving you a great alignment experience.
next_steps: Start wearing your aligners as instructed by your dental care provider
Attend scheduled remote check-ins to track progress
Reach out to the dental office if you have any questions or concerns during treatment
